The first chapters are amazing but

Here I am in 2019 playing Episode One for the first time.
Half-life 2 has aged so well and is so iconic that it very well might stay timeless forever.
I love the difficulty balance and how even the shoot outs feel like a puzzle with the tools at your disposal.
Especially the Gravity Gun that saves ammo and your life (like setting off traps at a safe distance)
The atmosphere and sound design are amazing.
And I love the little in-jokes about the player character.
Even dying can be fun in this game.

Only complaint is that when I play other games the level design seems kinda bad

Okey, este es quizas, uno de los juegos mas cortos de la saga, casi al nivel de blue shift eso creo, peeeero, eso no quita lo divertido y fantástico que es, comienza unas horas despues del epico final que nos dejo half life 2, nuestra mision es volver a la ciudadela para reactivar el núcleo y asi poder darles mas tiempo a nuestro protagonista de escapar de ciudad 17, creo que la principal del juego es el ser demasiado corto, unas 5 o 6 horas te tomara acabarlo, pero la acción frenetic, el encuentro con un personaje querido por muchos, los diálogos, el soundtrack que no es hace sentir como un p*to amo al ir a matar a todos esos zombies y soldados de la alianza que vengan a joder, el juego es totalmente independiente, osea que no necesitas de half life 2 para poder jugarlo, agregan el hdr que le da un toque espectacular a los lugares que vas recorriendo, la ciudadela y las calles de ciudad 17, el sistema de animacion facil tambien es mejorado y nos hace semtir aun mas comodo con la compañia que vendria siendo Alyx, que es capaz de defenderse por si sola y que es una completa dulzura (esta re buena ejem) y pues eso es half life 2 ep 1 un juego corto pero que te divierte cada segundo de su duracion, ademas, esta re baratl, compralo ya, ni siquiera deberia estar leyendo reseñas, osea es half life, es un pecado no tenerlo en tu biblioteca de steam, asi que anda, compra 10 y regalaselo a tus compas, todos deben deben disfrutar esta obra maestra, uan de las obras maestras de Valve
即使9102年了玩起来感觉还是很好玩 跟很多现在的大作比起来也不差

You would think that the immediate sequel to one of the best games of all time would be a complete flop and not live up to the hype the previous game built up but BOY this really is a good expansion for half life 2s universe and story adding in new mechanics quality of life improvements and just does a good job at being an expansion would reccomed ONLY if you have finished HL 2

Очень старая, красивая, и в тоже время не забытая игра

Episode 2 is a direct sequel to the great Half-Life 2.
After completing this game, there were tons of moments that made me smile a bit, and tons of moments that made me really angry.
Smiles:
Alyx is back! And now even better.
City 17. Great setting.

As for the angry moments...
I was frustrated at so many parts, that I cannot even count them. Sometimes, there are just too many things flying around your nose or behind your back. "Antlions! Take care of them, but do not forget those 5 annoyingly hidden Combines and the gunship!"
The part where I really lost it was the ending, especially [spoiler] the part with the Stryder... [/spoiler]
Overall, I am sad to give this game a 4/5. There were just too many frustrating moments that ruined the fun and expirience.

Half-Life = An awesome 1990's throwback game that's still fun to play.

Half-Life 2 = Arguably the greatest first-person shooter of all time. Also provided the foundation for all Source engine games.

Half-LIfe 2: Episode One = An excellent continuation of the Half-Life 2 storyline.

Half-Life 2: Episode Two = Why everyone wants Half-Life 3.

if you didn't play half-life , shame!
this gaming history!

HL2E1 is an iconic short expansion . developing the Half life characters (especially Alyx )  and it being the important chaine part that tell how Gordon , Alyx , rebels and the combine escape city 17 (instead of just skipping time) 

In terms of gameplay .is more of the same of HL2  but Valve once again pushing their physics to new limits . it clear the designer was toying how to make the companion AI being part of the gameplay loop by utilizing shadows , where you guide Alyx by where you point your flashlight . I recommend doing the "The One Free Bullet" achievements . it will be like new game experience . almost like you are playing a Overlord .

I don't get why people put HL2E1 in the same level of Blue shift in term of expansion quality . where in my personal opinion , HL2E1 is more memorable with mixing of the gameplay and focus on new gaming mechanics . you can skip Blue shift and miss nothing but you can't skip Episode 1.
игра очень хорошая но прошёл на 1 дыхании

Half-life 2: episode 1 is an addition that adds to the story of half-life 2, to understand more about what happened after Gordon freeman destroyed the citadel, and talks about the way of Gordon freeman out of the citadel and out of city 17.

Without to tell any spoilers, the gameplay, like in half-life 2, is fantastic, and the story is a great addition for half-life 2.

The game takes the levels of half-life, and takes out the boring parts in half-life 2, like the silent parts in the sewage, the vehicle levels and the ravenholme level, and gives only the juicy parts of the game, such as the chases levels, and the puzzle levels.

The game also add new and fun levels to explore with new mechanics, such as rescue level, in which you have to move the people in groups to a secure zone, while the combine is trying to attack them and many other more.

Unfortunately, I this addition is much shorter than half-life 2, and can be finished in some hours, but the game is used as an expansion to the game, and not as a full new game, which is something to be consider, and cannot replace the experience of the full game if you want to try it.

If you liked the second game in the half-life franchise “half-life 2” and it’s story and want more of it, and if you did not liked the vehicle levels and the ravenholme level, you will probably like this game, but if you did liked the vehicle levels or ravenholme level in half-life 2, or want a more longer game to experience, this is not a game for you.

Pros and cons:

Pros:
-	Fun levels like in half-life 2 and new ones
-	 Great puzzle levels
-	Great story
-	Remove some of the less fun parts in half-life 2 (in my opinion)
Cons:
-	Shorter then half-life 2 (can be complete in 6 - 7 hours)
-	No multiplayer (no need for)
-	No new weapons.

Game’s settings:
-	Violent game (contains blood)
-	Horror advanture game (contains scary imagery)
-	Story driven game.
-	Science fiction game.

*I give this game 9/10

[h1]Half-Life 2: Episode One[/h1]

[i]Захотел начать игру, после трёх часового геймплея решил сохраниться, т.к. памяти было мало, решил я значить удалить сохранения и оставить тот, на котором играл. Прошло 2 часа, а я всё так и не мог выйти с точки спавна, т.к. мне всё время убивали комбайны. Пришлось начать игру заного.

Игра сама по себе прекрасная, безусловно [u]10 из 10[/u]. Но... Выйдет третья часть, н-но... Она... Как бы сказать... На [b]VR[/b] платформе... Удачи в ожидании [b]Half-Life: Alyx[/b], где вы будете играть за Аликс между первым и вторым эпизодом. Удачи~
